description: Goh`s Lilligant was caught during a trip to Unova. It was revealed to his Pokémon at the Cerise Laboratory after completing their research in the Unova region. All the Pokémon fall in love with it but meanwhile, Goh`s Pinsir, who has feelings for Goh`s Heracross, is shocked and depressed by Goh`s Pinsir`s apparent infatuation with Goh`s Lilligant as the Sweet Scent of Lilligant`s flower makes it melt.
name: Dredear (Gou)
